timeline.message:
Bump up GoCD Version to 20.11.0

Signed-off-by: GoCD Build User <go-cd@googlegroups.com>

timeline.author: kritika-singh3
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -110,9 +110,9 @@ List<String> partitionFiles(Collection originalFiles) {
   return currentPartition ?: []
 }
 
-def GO_VERSION_PREVIOUS = '20.9.0'
-def GO_VERSION_SEGMENTS = [year: 20, releaseInYear: 10, patch: 0]
-def GO_VERSION_NEXT = '20.11.0'
+def GO_VERSION_PREVIOUS = '20.10.0'
+def GO_VERSION_SEGMENTS = [year: 20, releaseInYear: 11, patch: 0]
+def GO_VERSION_NEXT = '20.12.0'

timeline.message: Changed GO_VERSION_NEXT to a release for next year
